body.p: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, attorney. Jefferson County, Kentucky, native. Son of William C. Bullitt and Mildred Bullitt. Married to Theresa Langhorne Bullitt. Father of Theresa S. Bullitt, Pauline H. Bullitt, William C. Bullitt, John C. Bullitt, Morris L. Bullitt, Susan Bullitt, and James Fry Bullitt. Graduated from Centre College. Admitted to the bar in Louisville, Kentucky. Relocated to Philadelphia in 1849. Member of the Whig Party. Admitted to the bar in Philadelphia in 1849. Partner at Bullitt & Fairthorne, with Frederick Fairthorne. Attorney in Philadelphia from 1849 to 1902. Member of the Democratic Party.
